post_title: T206 Trade Prospects, Wanting to Downgrade...HOF List
post_content:
Hello - looking to possibly downgrade any of these.  If you have the same card in a lower grade and would want to trade up...either in exchange for some cash or throwing in something else, I'm willing to look.   My only sticking points are must be either PSA or SGC slabbed...not AUTH graded, and prefer worn and even wrinkled over a bunch of paper loss.  Obviously if a card is an EPDG, Tolstoi, Sovereign, etc...there is probably going to be more in value traded for a lower graded Piedmont or Sweet Caporal than if a different back....

T206 Duffy Sov460 - PSA 4 (Have a lower grade Duffy, would trade for something else lower grade, or Southern Leaguers don't have in low grade)
T206 Bobby Wallace SC150 - PSA 3
T206 Joe Kelley PD350  - SGC 3
T206 Keeler w/Bat SC350 - SGC 3
T206 Tinker Portrait SC150 - SGC 2
T206 Bresnahan Portrait EPDG - SGC 2 
T206 Mathewson Dark Cap Sov350 Apple - PSA 2 
T206 Home Run Baker Old Mill - SGC 2 
T206 Chesbro Portrait SC350 - SGC 2

Send me an email at [url]davidfaust904@gmail.com[/url] and I'll respond this evening.  I'm not trying to start trading scans here, much easier email.   Thanks.
Interesting…wish I could help, Good luck Dave!
Updated with cards I still have available for horse swapping to downgrade
